forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High near 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 50F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
